note:
Gave up on social media completely for a long while… but this one’s pretty good! I contain multitudes- music, technology, film/TV, animals, philosophy (faithfully agnostic), podcasts, natural world and space, culture and criticism, politics and history. All sexualities and gender ideas welcome and supported- some variations here, too. But maybe most of all- I love human oddity. #HighRiskCOVID19 #COVIDIsNotOver
#nobridge He/him (they/them)
